title: Low priority queue timer reset.Cant Play
body:
I Been trying to play league on my main account since 2 weeks ago, i have 5 Low Priority queue games, each time i queue for game timer resets when there's 14 minutes left.
I tried this already about 10 times on my PC, and now im trying on a different CPU and different Network and i have the same problem.
I did some research and im not the only having this problem, and this isnt a recent bug.

Any help Riot?

replies.body: Could you shoot me some screenshots showing the current time you've been in the queue and how much longer you need to wait? That'll give me enough proof to see that you've already waited the time you were meant to be in LPQ and I can figure something out for ya.

This is 2 of about 20 attempts since last week

https://imgur.com/YUJa1EY

https://imgur.com/zITeIU3

Looks like that reconnecting message is covering up the amount of time you've currently waited in the queue so I can't actually see if you're waiting longer than you should. Shoot me a screenshot where I can see the current time you've been in the queue (which should be under that reconnecting box). Right now it looks like your queue is just getting interrupted from losing the connection with the matchmaking servers, which you should be able to fix with the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

I already did that, 
https://imgur.com/a/ZfSk3

Nothing changed, i tried also on a friend PC and Network, same problem.
This is my main account and i have it since Season 2, so please help me unlock it.

https://imgur.com/a/MfnSf

I spent 6 minutes in the low priority and the timer reset to 20:00 minutes again. 

TIME REMAINING 
19:38

FINDING MATCH 
6:05

https://imgur.com/a/m3XKB

After wait for 7 minutes more now im not longer in queue....

https://imgur.com/a/WS3aV

Can i have a real solution please, this is frustrating, i have 1 week like this...

> [{quoted}](name=Warweak,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Ovs8niwE,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-22T21:21:49.523+0000)
